post.title: Will We See CTP Drops of XNA Studio
post.title_plain: Will We See CTP Drops of XNA Studio
post.content: Rob Caron has the scoop…as usual. MS is building a game specific version of VSTS called XNA Studio. From the press release, sounds like a bunch of additional features primarily around digital asset management. I wonder if such tools will be available to mere non-game-coding mortals?
post.excerpt: Rob Caron has the scoop…as usual. MS is building a game specific version of VSTS called XNA Studio. From the press release, sounds like a bunch of additional features primarily around digital asset management. I wonder if such tools will be available to mere non-game-coding mortals?
